item.title: Running Minio Cluster in Three Different Nodes
item.description: How to Run Minio in Different Nodes with Docker In this example I want to have 3 nodes in the Minio cluster. 1- install docker and docker compose To handle the Minio container in case of failure it’s good to have docker compose, so you should install it on each node. 2- define a docker compose There is an image for Minio in docker hub which we can use. According to the Minio documentation we need at least two disks for each node, that’s why I added two directories in /media directory like this:
